'''Secret Research Lab''' is an indoor gift set favored by the companions: [[Klee]], [[Sucrose]], [[Albedo]] and [[Lisa]].

It is obtained from the [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|24|x=240}}.
